title: The Last Werewolf
description: In a world where vampires lay claim to everything, Lily is the last werewolf alive. When The Hunter comes to town, catastrophe is sure to follow. The only barrier between her and certain death is Irving, a mage who discovers her secret and offers to keep her safe, and who is harboring secrets of his own. Lily will need all the help she can get for when The Hunter comes knocking.
author: Catherine  Banks
